707880f-b.text:
1-second Avenue, east side, and 55th Street, looking northards,
showing eleveted railroad.
2-Second Avenue, south of 55th Street, showiug Clifton movie house
on the west side of picture.
P. L. 'perr  April 7, 1941
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 1,2

707881f-a.text:
2nd Avenue, 55th to 56th St. (Before Reconstruction).
President Borough of Manhattan.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE.

713757f-a.text:
(1)
313-315 East 55th Street, north side, east of Second Avenue.
March 20, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, four years later. The houses are now abandoned.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 83.
